Security noteThis is a learning sandbox. Do not paste real secrets or live customer data. Outputs are for education, not production compliance.
Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

1. Choose your pipeline shape

GitHub with GitHub Actions to Container platform. Ship artefacts, promote through staging, and keep prod deploys boring. Good: Keep configs and secrets in env vars; fail builds on critical scans. Common mistake: Skipping staging or smoke tests sends surprises straight to prod.

2. Stages and gates

Pipeline robustness100/100

Solid. Tests, scans and staging reduce late-night surprises.

3. Visual timeline and deployment summary

Selected stages in order:

Lint and unit testsIntegration testsSecurity and dependency scansBuild artefactDeploy to stagingSmoke testsDeploy to production

Deployment summary

Estimated complexity: High

Risk level: Low

Complexity rises with more gates; risk drops when tests and security scans stay on.
